benchmark_details.name: CityAVOS
benchmark_details.overview: CityAVOS is the first benchmark dataset for autonomous search of common urban objects, comprising 2,420 tasks across six object categories with varying difficulty levels to evaluate UAV agentsâ€™ search capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized evaluation benchmark for the Aerial Visual Object Search (AVOS) tasks in urban environments.

data.source: Developed based on the EmbodiedCity platform built on Unreal Engine 5.3, featuring high-fidelity simulations of urban environments.
data.annotation: Tasks involve searching for objects based on visual and textual cues without external guidance.

methods: Automated evaluation and empirical testing with UAV agents
metrics: Success Rate Weighted by Inverse Path Length (SPL)
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the results of AVOS tasks where the UAV agent's performance is evaluated across defined success and efficiency criteria.
methodology.interpretation: Higher SR and SPL indicate better search efficiency and accuracy in identifying target objects, while lower NE suggests optimal navigation.
methodology.validation: Results validated through empirical testing against established baselines.
